Question
========
  
Research has shown that the average height of Dutch men is normally distributed. The average height is 184.0 cm with a standard deviation of 7.0 cm. Jochem has a height of 180.5 cm. What percentage of Dutch men will be shorter than Jochem?

  
Answerlist
----------
* 69.15%
* 30.85%
* 80.85%
* 19.15%


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
